description.value:
A shaman who selects the tribe spirit strives to protect her allies, whether they be a traditional tribal unit or a chosen group of adventuring companions.

Spirit Magic Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wa0zb2pncesmm9lz]{Bless} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.menqakfoa1ftvi3f]{Shield Other} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qn947hen3wrelxhz]{Create Food and Water} (3rd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0lrux8tmaml5fkw6]{Spiritual Ally} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f6lqt3ju8m7r5la2]{Life Bubble} (5th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.eg3i21asvo69mbma]{Battlemind Link} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqeaxoaozlv9vg35]{Vision} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gw2sgj93dgarpem8]{Discern Location} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.klcvk9ct1l7mhjwp]{Heal, Mass} (9th).

Spirit Animal: The shaman’s spirit animal has colorations or markings that resemble a totem or important symbol for the shaman’s tribe. When the spirit animal successfully performs the aid another action, the bonus it provides increases by 1.
